name: Realtimecommunication
tagline: Video conferencing using webrtc.webrtc is a technology used to trasfer file peer2peer,video conferencing and other peer2peer works
body:
This is just one application of Webrtc technology.This program is a scratch from muaz khan's webrtc tutorial.
Webrtc is a technology which is currently used by facebook,google for video conferencing,file transfer.
For more information visit:http://www.webrtc.org/
Visit Example:-www.appengine.hostoi.com/webrtc
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
